entry.name: bgColor
entry.label: Select the background color of the banner.

entry.name: fontSize
entry.label: Set the font size for the label.

entry.name: classification
entry.label: Set a text label for the banner.

entry.name: expanding
entry.label: If true, the banner tries to take all the available space in the panel.

entry.name: length
entry.label: length in pixels of the banner. Configuration effective only if expanding is set to false. A negative value means an invalid value that should be completely ignored.
